name: WHAMbulance
description:
WHAMbulance

A time strategy game about making money and "saving" lives. 

It's simple! 

  • Pick up patients and take them to the hospital before they die to earn money!
  • Hit people along the way and make sure the hospital still needs your services.
  • Buy upgrades at the hospital to improve your speed and carrying capacity.
  • With enough money, you can summon him and find out what true power is.
  • Don't let your victims succumb to their injuries before their timer runs out! You'll lose a ton of money.
  • When you've saved everyone you've won!
  • Until we can upload a new version, don't fall in the water ;)
Controls
  • WASD to drive
  • Press E to pick up "patients"
  • Esc to pause the game
